channel.title: cors, on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in cors, on Will Schenk

item.title: Simple CORS workaround for local development
item.description: I've been doing a lot of web development old school, just editing HTML and JavaScript by hand without a build environment. Running npx live-server is an easy one liner to spin up a server, that opens a browser for you and also updates changes on safe. Sometimes that's not enough. Often you want to pull in data from an API, and that requires HTTPS, and also you need to work around CORS limitations.
